column1: Local Foods////Everything we ordered was very good
column2: and a few things were just exceptional.  I had the truffled egg salad sandwich on pretzel bread.  OH. MY.  So good!  The egg salad itself was good
column3: but the dance of flavors in the whole sandwich was just divine.  The pretzel bread was a major part of that.  I would have bought several loaves if it had been for sale!  I'm not sure what else was on it (they list greens
column4: but there were more flavors - perhaps including some parm?)
column5: as I didn't want to take the time to take it apart.  But it was a divine combination.
